title: Overte
subtitle: Logic using the JavaScript API
abstract: Casual introduction into the capabilities of Overte's scripting engine.
description:
Try out scripting in Overte and see the endless possibilities.
You can join using the client from https://overte.org/#downloads (Windows or Linux)
You can also spectate the event on PeerTube.

persons.biography: I am one of the people behind Overte.
